title: Bullet Sound FX - Basic Collection
description: Top-notch bullet SFX bundling 11 different materials! GREAT VALUE!
longDescription:
Introducing: Bullet Sound FX - Basic Collection

$65.89 $49.99! ($15.90 SAVINGS!)


LISTEN TO PREVIEW HERE


Bullet Sound FX - Basic Collection is the best way to get quick results at an unbeatable quality & price.


This starter pack sound effects library features every bullet sound effect you need to get you started, including bullet impact sounds on various materials and ricochet sounds.


Boasting 440 sounds, this sound pack includes bullet impact sounds for 11 different materials:


Included in this collection:


  1. Wood 1 (wooden plank)
  2. Metal 4 (Steel)
  3. Dirt 1
  4. Dirt 2
  5. Gravel
  6. Shallow Water
  7. Sand
  8. Grass
  9. Concrete / Tarmac
  10. Glass 1 (breakable)
  11. Flesh


Available in other bundles & collections from this series (not included in this collection):


  • Guts
  • POV Character Hit
  • Soft Material (cloth)
  • Chain Link Fence
  • Tiles / Ceramic
  • Wood 2 (tree trunk)
  • Wood 3 (shattering)
  • Wood 4 (generic)
  • Metal 1 (heavy)
  • Metal 2 (sheet metal)
  • Metal 3 (armor plate)
  • Ice
  • Snow
  • Deep Water
  • Underwater
  • Vegetation / Leaves
  • Rock
  • Mud
  • Glass 2 (breakable)
  • Glass 3 (bulletproof)
  • Glass 4 (windshield)


Crafted to perfection with meticulous attention to detail, these sound effects are designed to fully immerse the player in the action.


The Bullet Sound FX - Basic Collection is the best way to get top-notch bullet sound effects at an incredibly competitive price, which makes it the great choice for any project involving firearms, guns and weapons.


This collection is part of a larger series and bundles sounds from other products of the series, available HERE! It contains sounds from these products at a DISCOUNTED PRICE (great value!):


Bullet Sound FX - Metal Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Dirt Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Glass Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Hard Impact Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Water Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Flesh Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Wilderness Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Wood Bundle
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 440

Sample rate: 44,100 Hz

Bit depth: 24 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 7m11s


To use this product, please import the files into your project and use a triggering

script / method of your choice. No special software required.
